A

android.smartcard - package android.smartcard
 

C

CardException - Exception in android.smartcard
Generic exception of the smartcard system.
CardException(String) - Constructor for exception android.smartcard.CardException
 
CardException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception android.smartcard.CardException
 
CardException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception android.smartcard.CardException
 
clear() - Method in class android.smartcard.SmartcardError
Clears the error.
close() - Method in interface android.smartcard.ICardChannel
Closes this channel.
createException() - Method in class android.smartcard.SmartcardError
Creates the encoded exception.
CREATOR - Static variable in class android.smartcard.SmartcardError
 

D

describeContents() - Method in class android.smartcard.SmartcardError
 

G

getReaders() - Method in class android.smartcard.SmartcardClient
Returns the friendly names of available smart card readers.

I

ICardChannel - Interface in android.smartcard
Abstraction of a basic or logical card channel, managed by a SmartcardClient instance, connected to the smartcard service.
isCardPresent(String) - Method in class android.smartcard.SmartcardClient
Returns true if a smartcard is present in the specified reader.
isClosed() - Method in interface android.smartcard.ICardChannel
Returns true if this channel is closed, false if this is open.
isLogicalChannel() - Method in interface android.smartcard.ICardChannel
Returns true if this is a logical channel, false if this is a basic channel.

O

openBasicChannel(String) - Method in class android.smartcard.SmartcardClient
Opens a basic channel to the card in the specified reader.
openBasicChannel(String, byte[]) - Method in class android.smartcard.SmartcardClient
Opens a basic channel to the card in the specified reader and selects the applet with the specified AID.
openLogicalChannel(String, byte[]) - Method in class android.smartcard.SmartcardClient
Opens a new logical channel to the card in the specified reader and selects the applet with the specified AID.

R

readFromParcel(Parcel) - Method in class android.smartcard.SmartcardError
 

S

serviceConnected() - Method in interface android.smartcard.SmartcardClient.ISmartcardConnectionListener
Called when the smartcard service is connected or reconnected.
serviceDisconnected() - Method in interface android.smartcard.SmartcardClient.ISmartcardConnectionListener
Called when the smartcard service is disconnected (because it died).
setError(Class, String) - Method in class android.smartcard.SmartcardError
Sets the error information.
shutdown() - Method in class android.smartcard.SmartcardClient
Disconnect from the smartcard service and release all acquired smartcard channels.
SmartcardClient - Class in android.smartcard
Adapter class to be used by clients of the smartcard service.
SmartcardClient(Context, SmartcardClient.ISmartcardConnectionListener) - Constructor for class android.smartcard.SmartcardClient
Constructs a new smartcard adapter to be used by clients.
SmartcardClient.ISmartcardConnectionListener - Interface in android.smartcard
Interface definition of smartcard listener to be informed about smartcard service connect and disconnect events.
SmartcardError - Class in android.smartcard
Smartcard service parameter class used to marshal exception information from the smartcard service to clients.
SmartcardError() - Constructor for class android.smartcard.SmartcardError
Creates an empty smartcard error container.
SmartcardError(String, String) - Constructor for class android.smartcard.SmartcardError
Creates a smartcard error which creates the specified exception.

T

throwException() - Method in class android.smartcard.SmartcardError
Throws the encoded exception.
transmit(byte[]) - Method in interface android.smartcard.ICardChannel
Transmits the specified command APDU and returns the response APDU.

W

writeToParcel(Parcel, int) - Method in class android.smartcard.SmartcardError
